MAN.TITLE: delete
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: delete a graphic entity and its children.

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : a handle, the handle of the entity to delete.

DESCRIPTION.P: This routine can be used to delete a graphics entity and all its chidren. Without any argument delete removes the current entity. With a handle argument it deletes the corresponding entity. With "all" argument it deletes all the entities of the current figure. The "callback" argument is noy yet handled.

MAN.EXAMPLE: set("figure_style","new") // select entity based graphics t=1:10;plot2d(t,t.^2), h=get("current_figure") //gets handle on the current figure a=h.children delete(a.children) delete(a) delete(h)
MAN.AUTHOR: Djamel Abdemouche
